com.ericbarnhill.jvcl

Class StockhamFFT

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ericbarnhill.jvcl.StockhamFFT

  • public class StockhamFFT
extends java.lang.Object
    Stockham FFT implementation in JogAmp. Note that this implementation is quite simple. Users are encouraged to fork it and add optimisations such as prime radixes, spin vectors, etc.
    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    ericbarnhill
    See Also:
    FTGPU
